com.bumptech.glide.presenter.target
Class ImageViewTarget

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.presenter.target.ImageViewTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Target
public class ImageViewTarget
extends java.lang.Object
implements Target

A target wrapping an ImageView. Obtains the runtime dimensions of the ImageView.

A method that is used to keep a reference to the ImagePresenter. Increases the efficiency of loads if it is possible that this target object will be used more than once.
